BuySell.title: {type, select, buy {Buy} sell {Sell} other {}} {base} with {quote}
BuySell.subtitle: Buy and sell {base} on Satoshi P2P with various payment methods
BuySell.estimatedPriceTooltip: This is estimated based on the available advertisements on P2P Zone. Click on Select Payment Method to view actual prices.
BuySell.feeRateTooltip: Upon order completion, the processing fee is automatically deducted from the total crypto quantity when seller release the crypto to buyer

HowTo.buyMainTitle: How to buy {base} via P2P Express
HowTo.buyStepOneTitle: 1. Get matched with the best offers
HowTo.buyStepOneContent: Select your {base} and {quote} pair, enter your purchase amount, and get matched with top offers.
HowTo.buyStepTwoContent: Select your preferred payment method, and pay the seller within time limit
HowTo.buyStepThreeContent: Once the seller confirms payment, you'll receive {base} in your funding wallet
HowTo.sellMainTitle: How to sell {base} via P2P Express
HowTo.sellStepOneTitle: 1. Get matched with the best offers
HowTo.sellStepOneContent: Select your {base} and {quote} pair, enter your sell amount, and get matched with top offers.
HowTo.sellStepThreeContent: Once you receive {quote} in your account from the buyer, release the {base} to the buyer

Advantages.firstContent: Where as many other P2P platforms target specific markets, Satoshi P2P provides a truly global trading experience with support for more than 70 local currencies.
Advantages.secondContent: Trusted by millions of users worldwide, Satoshi P2P provides a safe platform to conduct crypto trades in 800+ payment methods and 100+ fiat currencies. Users can easily buy, sell and trade crypto directly with other users, while setting their preferred prices and payment methods in an open crypto marketplace.
Advantages.thirdContent: Trade crypto with the freedom to buy and sell at your preferred prices. Buy or sell from the existing offers, or create trade advertisements to set your own prices.

Register.title: Register
Register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Register.tosRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions
Register.defaultError: An error ocurred. Try again later

Verification.step1Body: We will send you an email with a link to confirm your email address
Verification.step2Body: We will ask for your official ID and a video of your face
Verification.step3CompleteTitle: You're all set! Make your first transaction
Verification.step3Body: We will send you an email with a link to confirm your email address

ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password
ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.emailSentDescription: We have sent you an email with instructions to reset your password
